alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:40AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ..Light freezing rain across portions of northeastern Nevada... Freezing rain has been observed at the Elko National Weather Service Office. Pockets of light freezing rain are occurring across some valleys mainly in Elko county where air temperatures remain just below freezing. Slick spots can develop quickly, especially on untreated road surfaces creating treacherous driving conditions. A light layer of ice will develop on elevated surfaces where the air temperature remains below 32F. This very light freezing rain should transition to rain after sunrise as temperatures rise above freezing. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
